item.title: Drizzle: the most influential software project youâ€™ve (probably) never heard of
item.description: Drizzle aimed to rewrite the MySQL database server. It instead rewrote collaborative software development.
item.dc:creator: Florian Haas

item.title: Fragile Development: Scrum is terrible, and you should ditch it
item.description: Scrum is irrational, impractical, and outright dangerous for software development. It is time to stop considering it a viable method for building software.
item.dc:creator: florian
